original_text: God hides some things now. But there will be a time when people will see them. God keeps some things secret now. But there will be a time when people will understand those things clearly.
korean_text: 숨은 것이 장차 드러나지 아니할 것이 없고 감추인 것이 장차 알려지고 나타나지 않을 것이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: But there will be a time
God keeps some things secret now.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 지금 어떤 것들을 비밀로 유지하십니다.

sentences.original_text: But there will be a time
when people will understand those things clearly.
